channel.title: Need help with player rights please

item.title: Need help with player rights please
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Noes_PIERATS Oh Noes! PIERATS!
item.description:
@Oh_Noes_PIERATS wrote:

.dats are able to be directly edited like that.
search for if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("
untill you find something that looks like this:ig(playerName.eqalsIgnoreCase("Name here")){ playerRights = 2;}[code] and just change the name to what u want[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with player rights please

item.title: Need help with player rights please
item.dc:creator: @nikk nikk
item.description:
@nikk wrote:

Open the characters FOLDER and from there right click>edit to the account you want to alter,
Then look for player rights (Ctrl+F) and change to 0(normal) 1 (moderator) 2 (admin) 3 (owner) then save
Hope that helps

Read full topic
